methods.name: arc72_ownerOf
methods.desc: Returns the address of the current owner of the NFT with the given tokenId

returns.desc: The current owner of the NFT

methods.name: arc72_tokenURI
methods.desc: Returns a URI pointing to the NFT metadata

methods.name: arc72_approve
methods.desc: Approve a controller for a single NFT

methods.name: arc72_setApprovalForAll
methods.desc: Approve an operator for all NFTs for a user

args.name: approved
args.desc: true to give approval, false to revoke

methods.name: arc72_totalSupply
methods.desc: Returns the number of NFTs currently defined by this contract

methods.name: arc72_tokenByIndex
methods.desc: Returns the token ID of the token with the given index among all NFTs defined by the contract
